website_summaries.verdict: This wide overbed desk rolls on caster wheels so you can easily climb in and out. Best for full and twin models.
pros: Overbed desk spans entire bed on caster wheels, which have brakes
Tabletop has plenty of room for a laptop, papers, phone, and more
Can use easily without tipping, unlike tabletop designs
cons: May not roll easily over carpet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs after its tricked out with 4 inch wheels
customer_reviews.text: I broke my leg and ankle and have to work from home. I love this desk but my bed height and carpet was challenging. My bed is queen size. I needed a few more inches in height and easier wheel movement. A good friend who is handy at everything spent thirty dollars on 4- 4 inch industrial wheels, two 2x4s, black satin paint, and large screws to make this an ideal product for me. Now I can ice and elevate my leg properly and get some work done with less discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Bucatini lover

It’ll do but won’t be long term.

The other reason would be if it had levers as opposed to turning wheels. If someone was handicapped, they would be hard to navigate. Manufacturer: If you are reading this and decide to put 2 levers on it to make it easier to spread and raise, please let me know. I would DEFINITELY buy the upgrade.
